summary:
This mod is not a Lore friendly .
Six it'll add a stand-alone followers.
descriptionHtml:
[I English is not almost speak][b][[/b]This sentence is a Google translation.]
[b][u][size=2][This MOD is not a Lore friendly][/size][/u]


[b][b][size=5][About this mod][/size][/b]
[/b][/b]It'll add the [size=3][b][u]matoi[/u][/b] [/size]and [b][u][size=3]Michelle[/size][/u][/b] and [b][u][size=3]Marion[/size][/u][/b] and [size=3][b][u]Mia[/u][/b][/size] and [size=3][b][u]Marlene[/u][/b][/size] of stand-alone followers.[b][b]
[/b][/b]
Fighting style of [u][b]Matoi[/b][/u] is a tank type using the shield.
Range healing it has a shout that could.

Fighting style of[b][u] Michelle's[/u][/b] bare hands.
It will not have the high avoidance capability.
It uses thunder magic in long distance.

Fighting style of [size=2][b][u]Marion[/u][/b] [/size]will be ice magic attack in long distance.
Her ice magic to stop the movement of the opponent.
Recovery capacity is not, but is good at repel combat an opponent.

Fighting style of [b][u]Mia[/u][/b] is close combat that uses a two-handed weapon .
She is a messenger of Dibera . You can get a large damage to male .
There is a large self-healing ability , but recast will has set a longer .

Fighting style of[b][u] Marlene[/u][/b] is flame magic .In addition , you can use the Guardian Circle.
She is a possible marriage .

Fighting style of [b][u][size=2]Mina[/size][/u][/b] is the recovery and archery .
In addition, I remember one magic .

Location :Matoi/Gildergreen square of Whiterun 
               Michelle/Near Battle Born house of Whiterun
　　　　　　　Marion/Nearby Heimskri of Whiterun
               Mia/It is in the same location as Michelle.
               Marlene/Before the Cathedral of whiterun
　　　　　　　Mina/The side of Arcadia's Cauldron

Perk :Matoi/One-handed, Two-handed, Block, Light Armor, Heavy Armor, Archery
         Michelle/Light Armor, Heavy Armor,Destruction
         Marion/Two-handed,Light Armor, Heavy Armor,Destruction,Alteration
         Mia/One-handed, Two-handed, Block, Light Armor, Heavy Armor, Archery
         Marlene/Light Armor, Heavy Armor,Destruction,Alteration
         Mina/Light Armor, Heavy Armor, Archery

Bodytype:UNP

[size=5][b][Change Log][/b][/size]
[size=2]v0.81/[/size]We added a Low power edition.(v0.81)
[size=2]v0.80/[/size]We were implemented Mina of stand-alone followers.[size=2]
v0.73/We will update the face of Marlene[/size][size=2]
v0.72/Skeletons and height and face of Matoi we have to adjust .[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]v0.71/We added a Low power edition.(v0.72)
v0.7/We were implemented Marlene of stand-alone followers.
v0.6/We were implemented Mia of stand-alone followers.
        [b][u]The strength of the Matoi and Michelle have to adjust .
[/u][/b]        Michelle of v0.6 during battle with the high-level enemy is recommended for use with armor fighting damage is increased .
v0.5/We were implemented Marion of stand-alone followers.
v0.4/We were implemented Michelle of stand-alone followers.
v0.3/Modification of the face + The downward revision of the strength of Matoi
v0.2/Low-power edition added：The half-attack, defense, recovery
v0.1/[/size]Matoi of stand -alone followers will be added .
